001import java.util.Stack;
002import java.util.HashMap;
003import java.util.Set;
004
005/**
006 * The Player class represents a player in the game.
007 * A player has a name, a current room, a collection of carried items,
008 * and a stack of visited rooms to facilitate navigation.
009 * The player can carry items up to a specified maximum weight.
010 * The player can interact with the environment by picking up and dropping items,
011 * and eating food.
012 * 
013 * @author Florian NELCHA
014 */
015public class Player
016{
017    // ### Attributes ###
018    private String        aName;
019    private Room          aCurrentRoom;
020    private double        aInvWeight;
021    private double        aMaxWeight;
022    public  Stack<Room>   aVisitedRooms;
023    private Item          aItemInHand;
024    private ItemList      aInventory;
025    private UserInterface aGui;
026    
027    // ### Constructor ###
028    
029    /**
030     * Constructs a new player with a name and starting room.
031     * The player's inventory is initialized with zero weight and a maximum weight of 10.0.
032     * 
033     * @param pName The name of the player.
034     * @param pStartRoom The starting room for the player.
035     */
036    public Player(final String pName, final Room pStartRoom)
037    {
038        this.aName = pName;
039        this.aCurrentRoom = pStartRoom;
040
041        this.aInvWeight = 0.0;
042        this.aMaxWeight = 10.0;
043        
044        this.aVisitedRooms = new Stack<>();
045        this.aInventory = new ItemList();
046    } // Player()
047    
048    // ### Setters ###
049    
050    /**
051     * Sets the game graphical user interface.
052     * 
053     * @param pUserInterface instance of the userInterface class.
054     */
055    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
056    {
057        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
058    } // setGUI()
059    
060    // ### Getters ###
061    
062    /**
063     * Gets the player's name.
064     * 
065     * @return The name of the player.
066     */
067    public String getPlayerName() 
068    {
069        return this.aName;
070    } // getPlayerName()
071    
072    /**
073     * Gets the current room the player is in.
074     * 
075     * @return The current room.
076     */
077    public Room getCurrentRoom()
078    {
079        return this.aCurrentRoom;
080    } // getCurrentRoom()
081    
082    /**
083     * Gets the total weight of the items in the player's inventory.
084     * 
085     * @return The total weight of the inventory.
086     */
087    public double getInvWeight()
088    {
089        return this.aInventory.getTotalWeight();
090    } // getInvWeight()
091    
092    /**
093     * Returns a string representation of the player's inventory.
094     * 
095     * @return A string displaying the items in the inventory and their total weight.
096     */
097    public String getInvString()
098    {
099        return "Inventory : " + this.aInventory.getItemString() + "\nTotal weight: " + this.getInvWeight() + " (max " + this.aMaxWeight + ")";
100    } // getInvString()
101    
102    // ### Other methods ###
103    
104    /**
105     * Moves the player to a new room and adds the 
106     * current room to the "visited rooms" history.
107     * 
108     * @param pR The room the player is moving to.
109     */
110    public void goRoom(final Room pR)
111    {
112        this.aVisitedRooms.push(this.aCurrentRoom);
113        this.aCurrentRoom = pR;
114    } // goRoom()
115    
116     /**
117     * Moves the player back to the previous room (if it's accessible)
118     * using the "visited rooms" history.
119     */
120    public void goBack()
121    {
122        Room vPreviousRoom = this.aVisitedRooms.pop();
123        if (!this.aCurrentRoom.isExit(vPreviousRoom))
124        {
125            this.aGui.println("You cannot go back this way.");
126            return;
127        }
128        this.aCurrentRoom = vPreviousRoom;
129    } // goBack()
130    
131    /**
132     * Allows the player to pick up an item from the current room and add it to their inventory.
133     * The player cannot carry the item if it exceeds their maximum weight capacity.
134     * 
135     * @param pItemName The name of the item to be picked up.
136     */
137    public void take(final String pItemName)
138    {
139        Item vItem = this.aCurrentRoom.getItem(pItemName);
140        if (vItem == null)
141        {
142            this.aGui.println("There is no item with that name here.");
143            return;
144        }
145        
146        double vNewWeight = this.getInvWeight() + vItem.getWeight();
147        
148        if (vNewWeight > this.aMaxWeight)
149        {
150            this.aGui.println("Maximum weight exceeded. You cannot carry that item.");
151            return;
152        }
153        
154        this.aInventory.addItem(vItem);
155        this.aCurrentRoom.removeItem(pItemName);
156        this.aGui.println(pItemName + " picked up.");
157        
158        if(pItemName.equals("watch"))
159        {
160            this.aGui.aTimerLabel.setVisible(true);
161        }
162    } // take()
163    
164    /**
165     * Drops an item from the player's inventory into the current room.
166     * 
167     * @param pItemName The name of the item to be dropped.
168     */
169    public void drop(final String pItemName)
170    {
171        Item vItem = this.aInventory.getItem(pItemName);
172        if (vItem == null)
173        {
174            this.aGui.println("You are not carrying that item.");
175            return;
176        }
177        this.aInventory.removeItem(pItemName);
178        this.aCurrentRoom.addItem(vItem);
179        this.aGui.println(pItemName + " dropped.");
180        
181        if(pItemName.equals("watch"))
182        {
183            this.aGui.aTimerLabel.setVisible(false);
184        }
185    } // drop()
186    
187    /**
188     * When called, the player uses the specified item.
189     * Only works if the player wants to use a "usable" item, in the right room.
190     * 
191     * @param pItemName The name of the item to be used.
192     * @return True if the item has correctly been used, false otherwise.
193     */
194    public boolean use(final String pItemName)
195    {
196        Item vItem = this.aInventory.getItem(pItemName);
197        if (vItem == null)
198        {
199            this.aGui.println("You are not carrying that item.");
200            return false;
201        }
202        
203        if (pItemName.equals("sensor") && this.aInventory.getItem("toolbox") == null)
204        {
205            this.aGui.println("You need a toolbox to place the sensor.");
206            return false;
207        }
208        
209        if (pItemName.equals("sensor") || pItemName.equals("fuse") || pItemName.equals("fuel"))
210        {
211            this.aInventory.removeItem(pItemName);
212            return true;
213        }
214        else
215        {
216            this.aGui.println("You cannot use this.");
217            return false;
218        }
219    } // use()
220    
221    /**
222     * Allows the player to eat an item, modifying the player's attributes
223     * based on the item.
224     * 
225     * @param pItemName The name of the item to be eaten.
226     */
227    public void eat(final String pItemName) 
228    {
229        Item vItem = this.aInventory.getItem(pItemName);
230        if (vItem == null) 
231        {
232            this.aGui.println("You are not carrying that item.");
233            return;
234        }
235    
236        if (pItemName.equals("boost_pill")) 
237        {
238            this.aMaxWeight *= 2;
239            this.aInventory.removeItem(pItemName);
240            this.aGui.println("You ate the Boost Pill! Your carrying capacity has doubled to " + this.aMaxWeight + ".");
241        } 
242        else if (pItemName.equals("chips"))
243        {
244            this.aInventory.removeItem(pItemName);
245            this.aGui.println("You ate a pack of Orbitos ! You are not hungry anymore.");
246        }
247        else
248        {
249            this.aGui.println("You cannot eat this.");
250        }
251    } // eat()
252    
253    /**
254     * Charges the beamer in the player's inventory with the current 
255     * room, if the player is carrying it. Otherwise, a message is displayed.
256     * 
257     * @param pItemName The room to be charged in the beamer.
258     */
259    public void chargeBeamer(final String pItemName)
260    {
261        Item vItem = this.aInventory.getItem(pItemName);
262        if (vItem == null) 
263        {
264            this.aGui.println("You are not carrying the beamer.");
265            return;
266        }
267        
268        Beamer vB = (Beamer)vItem;
269        
270        vB.charge(this.aCurrentRoom);
271        this.aGui.println("Beamer charged.");
272    }
273    
274    /**
275     * Fires the beamer in the player's inventory to teleport them to the charged 
276     * room, if the player is carrying it.
277     * If its not charged or not in the player's inventory, a message is displayed.
278     * 
279     * @param pItemName The room to be teleported in.
280     */
281    public void fireBeamer(final String pItemName)
282    {
283        Item vItem = this.aInventory.getItem(pItemName);
284        if (vItem == null) 
285        {
286            this.aGui.println("You are not carrying the beamer.");
287            return;
288        }
289        
290        Beamer vB = (Beamer)vItem;
291
292        Room vFiredRoom = vB.fire();
293        if(vFiredRoom == null)
294        {
295            this.aGui.println("The beamer is not charged.");
296            return;
297        }
298        this.aCurrentRoom = vFiredRoom;
299        this.aGui.println("Teleported "+ this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription());
300    }
301}
